scripts.make: bun run build && bun run build:desktop && bun x electron-forge make
scripts.package: bun run build && bun run build:desktop && bun x electron-forge package
scripts.start: bun run dev:desktop && bun x electron-forge start
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bun x gh-pages -b playgrounds -d apps/web/dist && bun run deploy:clean
scripts.deploy:dev: bun run build && bun x gh-pages -b preview -d apps/web/dist && bun run deploy:clean
scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:web
scripts.dev: bun run dev:packages && bun run dev:web
scripts.build:packages: bun run build:components && bun run build:extensions && bun run build:workspaces
scripts.dev:packages: bun run dev:components && bun run dev:extensions && bun run dev:workspaces
